segments.text: I see the sink area first, with the woman at work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing the plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water is gushing from the tap, overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's drenching the cabinets and floorâ€”disgraceful negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, foot in the flood, clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are behind her, up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the unstable stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That thing could topple and cause a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, excited for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so bold, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is lovely, calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This hidden chaos in such a normal setting is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before disaster strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR
